text:
@narendramodi Avoid touching *MEN* to stop the spread of *COVID-19* 

 *M- Mouth* 
 *E-  Eye* 
 *N- Nose* 

Follow *WOMEN* to prevent COVID-19

 W- Wash your hands with soap*
 O- Obey directives*
 M- Move away from crowded places
 E-  Exercise regularly*
 N- Never ignore a warning signals.*
